resources.string: That mobile app should be used in order to translate english words into uzbek. In terms of screens, totally, it consists of three layouts. They are:main screen with navigation menu, WordListActivity with SearchView and WordPresenterActivity showing the translations of words. Also DrawerMenu includes 4 frames to go through another activities. If you find some mistakes in that app or you have some ideas to change, you can contact with that account @PrincessaLo
